question: The creature pointed to the glowing number line and said, "Fill in the empty box and complete the number sentence."
This number sentence has a missing part, said the creature. “Can you complete it by filling in the empty box?”
The next challenge of Thomas was to fill in the boxes to complete the number sentence.
Help Thomas in filling in the correct numbers to complete the number sentence.
Thomas must fill in the blank boxes to complete the multiplication sentence and reach the next challenge.
There are numbers missing in the multiplication sentence. Thomas needs your help to fill in the empty boxes.
His next challenge was to complete the multiplication sentence by filling the empty boxes.
The forest creature challenged Thomas with the below given number line. Help him by completing the number sentence.
Thomas needs to form this multiplication sentence by filling in the empty box.
Thomas got one last multiplication sentence challenge. He must fill in the empty box to complete it.
